To run the program, please execute the following commands:
1/ make
2/ ./main

Expected results:
- Encrypted: 1000000101000100010101111111100000000000110101000000111110110100 (814457F800D40FB4 in Hex)
- Decrypted: 0100010100110000000000011110110111101101010101010011000000000001 (453001EDED553001 in Hex)
